name: Labyrinth lab
description:
In world of Plasmoids, there are an infinite number of rooms with unstable labyrinths and the most daring Plasmoids go to explore unknown labyrinths to stabilize them with four colored elements, defeat pest monster and find portal to next room.

プラズモイドの世界には、不安定な迷路のある無限に大きい部屋があり、最も勇敢なプラズモイドは、未知の部屋の探索に派遣されました。迷路を4つの色の物質を使って安定させ、モンスターを倒し、次の部屋への入り口を見つける必要があります。

Tutoreal

by pressing character a go to a parallel platform Catch white dots to increase time Main task is to collect all the colored dots in center.
